zaan.name: Zaan
zaan.description: Monster Set from Scalecaller Peak. Deals Fiery damage and apply burning to the target within 8 meters through a tethering

stormfist.name: Stormfist
stormfist.description: Monster Set from Tempest Island. Has a chance to summon a storm fist which deals initial and AoE damage
stormfist.usage: Wear it and damage. It has a 10% proc chance

grothdarr.name: Grothdarr
grothdarr.description: Monster Set from Vaults of Madness. Has a 10% chance to create a Lava AoE underneath you
grothdarr.usage: Wear it and damage. It has a 10% proc chance
